729308f-a.text:
1535 Richmond Rvenue, east side, between Merrill Avenue and Acron Street. The house was owned in 1874 by Ers. Turner, and in 1907 by Mich. Bitito. (see maps).
May 21, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729308f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Merrill Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729309f-a.text:
1583 Richmond Avenue, east side, adjoining (to the south) Merrill Avenue. Beers's map of 1874 shows the house to have belonged to C. Dunn.
May 19, 1935
P. L. Sperr
729309f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Merrill Avenue, Staten Island, NY
